scripts.maintenance:enable:preview: vercel env add VITE_MAINTENANCE_MODE true preview
scripts.maintenance:disable:preview: vercel env add VITE_MAINTENANCE_MODE false preview
scripts.maintenance:enable:production: vercel env add VITE_MAINTENANCE_MODE true production
scripts.maintenance:disable:production: vercel env add VITE_MAINTENANCE_MODE false production
scripts.maintenance:status: echo 'Check maintenance status in Vercel Dashboard > Settings > Environment Variables'
